title: How to unlock Mastery 7? I have the items.
body: So I have 3 mastery tokens and like 25k blue essence, which the description says can be used to unlick it, but I can't do anything with the mastery tokens in the loot screen. How do I do it?

replies.body: You should be able to click on those mastery tokens in your loot and have the option to upgrade that champions mastery level. If it's not working, try running a quick repair and let me know if that helps or not.
